name: wordpress
description: WordPress is a widely-used content management system for building self-hosted websites and blogs. It offers themes, plugins, user management, REST APIs, and an extensible editor, powering everything from simple sites to complex portals.
features: Content editor: Create and edit posts and pages with a block-based visual editor or classic text interface.
Theme system: Customize site appearance with thousands of free and premium themes or build custom designs.
Plugin architecture: Extend functionality with over 60,000 plugins for SEO, e-commerce, forms, and more.
User management: Define roles and permissions for authors, editors, administrators, and custom user types.
Media library: Upload and organize images, videos, and documents with built-in editing tools.
SEO friendly: Generate clean URLs, manage meta tags, and integrate with SEO plugins for better rankings.
REST API: Access content programmatically for headless CMS setups and mobile app integration.
Multilingual ready: Build sites in any language with translation plugins and RTL text support.
Custom post types: Create specialized content structures beyond posts and pages for portfolios or directories.
Widget areas: Add dynamic content to sidebars and footers with drag-and-drop widget management.
Scheduled publishing: Set posts to publish automatically at specific dates and times.
Revision history: Track content changes over time and restore previous versions when needed.
